t: Vision Balm® - Product & Brand Photographer/Videographer— Should You Use Stock Photos for Your Product on Amazon?
s: December 1, 2022 - Sorry to break it to you, but our honest answer is no when it comes to using stock photos for your product on Amazon. There are many reasons for this, but the main being that you will be misleading your potential customers on what your product actually looks like.
